Translations.Text: tse kolysʹ traplyayetʹsya do tsykh khto uspadkovuyutʹ zemlyu pislya poperednikh heneratsiy shcho, yakshcho my budemo, my mozhemo pokaraty yikh dlya yikhnikh hrikhiv, ta opechatuye yikhni serdenʹka, vyklykayuchi yim do obihu hlukhoho

My rozpovidayemo do vas istoriya tsykh spilʹnot: yikhni kur'yery poyikhaly yim z yasnymy dokazamy, ale vony ne musyatʹ viryty v yaki vony vidkhylyly ranishe. BOH takym chynom opechatuye serdenʹka disbelievers
My znayshly shcho bilʹshistʹ yikh disregard yikhnya domovlenistʹ; my znayshly bilʹshistʹ yikh bezputnykh
Pislya (tsi kur'yery,) my poslaly Moses z nashymy znakamy Pharaoh ta yoho lyudy, ale vony porushyly. Prymitka naslidky dlya bezputni
Moses skazav, "O Pharaoh, ya ye kur'yer z Lorda vsesvitu
pokladeno na meni shcho ya ne kazhu pro BOHA krim pravdy. YA prybuvayu do vas z znakom z vashoho Lorda; dozvolʹte Dityam Izrayilya idutʹ
Vin skazav, "Yakshcho vy mayete znak, todi vyroblyayete tse, yakshcho vy ye pravdyvi
Vin kynuv vnyz yoho personal, ta tse povernulosya u velycheznoho zmiya
Vin vytyahuvav yoho ruku, ta bulo bilo do beholders
